page.title: 09The Clock Tower.
page.content: The Clock Tower stands at the square of Dufftown.It took 3 years to build and was completed in 1839.The clock which comes from Banff is known as the{"clock that hung Macpherson" Macpherson was a free-booter who robbed the rich and gave to the poor. Lord Braco,the Sherriff of Banff promised to hang Macpherson.The locals raised a petition for the{pardon}of Macpherson.This was eventually granted by the High Court in Edinburgh,but Lord Braco,seeing the messenger cantering across the Banff Bridge advanced the clock 15 minutes.Thus the executoin of Macpherson took place before the{pardon}was in the Sherriffs hands.Later the clock was removed from Banff and placed in the tower of Dufftown.Previosly it was a jail but now is the Tourist Information Bureau.
